actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Highway Beautification Act to permit the States to allow business and residential directional signs on Interstate and primary systems.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Highway Beautification Act to permit States to allow the erection of signs, displays, or devices adjacent to highways on the Interstate Highway System under specified conditions.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Highway Beautification Act to permit the States to allow business and residential directional signs on Interstate and primary systems.
